title: Rob Zombie Confirms Role In 'Guardians Of The Galaxy 2' | SHROOM | 100.1 WKQQ
text: Rob Zombie Confirms Role In 'Guardians Of The Galaxy 2' posted by Shroom - A post shared by RobZombieofficial (@robzombieofficial) on Feb 22, 2017 at 6:12pm PST It isn’t a James Gunn film without @RobZombie ’s voice!! https://t.co/wv8SM6c177 — James Gunn (@JamesGunn) February 23, 2017 {"position1":{"name":"Rob Zombie & White Zombie","id":762104,"url":"https:\/\/www.iheart.com\/artist\/rob-zombie-white-zombie-762104","type":"artist","errors":null,"tagged":true}} Contact
